entry.def: A projectionist is someone whose job is to work a projector at a cinema.

means.word_mean: 1. the person who operates the projector in a movie house

auth_sentence.content: Tom Lawes, owner of the Electric Cinema in Birmingham, has made a documentary called The Last Projectionist.
